name: CategorizeTransactionAsRefund
description:
Categorize a transaction as a credit note refund.

Use this tool to categorize an uncategorized bank transaction specifically as a refund from a credit note.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization. Must match the organization in Zoho Books to categorize transactions accurately.

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the bank transaction to categorize as a refund from a credit note.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the bank transaction.

parameters.name: transaction_details
parameters.description: Details of the transaction to be categorized, including credit note ID, transaction date, refund mode, reference number, transaction amount, exchange rate, source account ID, and a brief description.

creditnote_id.description: ID of the credit note that has to be refunded.

refund_mode.description: Mode of refund. Ex - Cash, Cheque etc.,

exchange_rate.description: The foreign currency exchange rate value.

from_account_id.description: The account ID from which money will be transferred(Mandatory for specific type of transactions). These accounts differ with respect to transaction_type. Ex: To a bank account, from-account can be: bank , card, income, refund. To a card account, from account can be: bank, card, refund.

description.description: A brief description about the transaction.
